name: Punkin
description:
Punkin is a prototype pumpkin carving simulator that is still in development.

Currently you can cut the pumpkin, remove the guts, and light the jack o' lantern with a match. You can reset the level using the light switch on the left.

The game with update with a few little features once in a while but it's mostly going to be used as an experiment in point-and-click mechanics with Unity. Things to look forward to are baking pumpkin seeds, washing dishes, hidden animations, sound effects, music (that you can change with the radio), and more.

Please leave a comment below if you like my game and check back once in a while for future updates!
